acid.name: Acid
acid.parts: The monster must have the acid trait or an attack or spell that deals acid damage.
acid.effect: You imbue the weapon with vitriolic acid.

school.text: Choose when you first imbue the weapon for the granted spells to be either arcane or primal.

magic.2: The weapon can cast acid splash as a cantrip, heightened to half the item's level rounded up.
magic.4: The weapon can cast acidic burst once per day.
magic.6: The weapon's acidic burst heightens to 2nd level and it can cast either acid arrow or acidic burst once per day, but not both.
magic.8: The weapon's acidic burst heightens to 3rd level, and it can cast acid arrow and acidic burst each once per day.
magic.10: Strikes with the weapon deal 1 additional acid damage.
magic.12: The weapon's acid arrow heightens to 4th level, and the weapon can cast acid storm once per day.
magic.14: The additional acid damage increases to 1d4.
magic.16: The weapon's acid arrow heightens to 6th level and acid storm heightens to 7th level.
magic.18: The additional acid damage increases to 1d6.
magic.20: The weapon can cast storm of vengeance once per day but you can only choose the acid rain effect. You can choose the acid rain effect twice in a row.
